data.subject: Waiting For A Train (Feat. Duane Allman)
data.lyric:
All around the water tank
 Waiting for a train
 A thousand miles away from home
 Sleeping in the rai

data.subject: Loan Me A Dime (Feat. Duane Allman)
data.lyric:
Somebody loan me a dime
 I need to call my old time used to be
 Somebody loan me a dime mmm
 I need
